website_summaries.verdict: Featuring a lightweight and breathable structure, the Keen Uneek EXO lets the wearer do more without sacrificing comfort. It’s also reasonably-priced, with a great style that works with a lot of outfits for different activities. Convenience and durability are offered by its stretchy laces and mesh upper, making this a well-rounded shoe from the Keen casual shoe collection.
pros: The Keen Uneek EXO is affordable
Many users praise the sneaker for its design, saying that it looks great and that it’s a stylish update to the original Keen Uneek model
A lot of reviewers laud the kicks for offering comfort right out of the box
According to some purchasers, the Keen Uneek EXO is lightweight
The shoe offers decent arch support, several buyers have perceived
A few wearers find the sneaker is pleasantly breathable
More than a handful of users have imparted that they have worn this model every day
Quite a few purchasers commend the Keen Uneek EXO for its high-quality construction
Some buyers particularly like the bungee lacing, which eliminates the need for tying up while keeping the sneaker tight
Several wearers have enjoyed the shoe’s slip-on function
cons: This model has a limited range of colorways

customer_reviews.title: Goofy and Uncomfortable...
customer_reviews.text: Over the years, I've probably owned 20+ pairs of Keens including sandals, hiking boots, hiking shoes, casual shoes, winter boots and aluminum toe work boots. I've noticed a trend in recent years that Keen products are not fitting me like they use to. This may be attributed to my feet changing over the years, but I suspect it's more likely Keen saving a nickel per shoe on materials by sliming them down. The foot beds and toe boxes were previously wider than most brands, which I need and appreciated. This particular pair of shoes ran narrow, weren't comfortable or supportive and were pretty goofy looking, too. I wouldn't consider them.
customer_reviews.author: Oasky

customer_reviews.title: Little Support
customer_reviews.text: Have owned several Keen shows in the past that fit very well and are comfortable, including Uneeks. However, these shoes have virtually no support. They are basic foot coverings. This is not Keen's best work.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bashaw

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FOOT PROTECTION
customer_reviews.text: These are great 3-season shoes/sandals. More protection than a sandal.. we’ll be able to walk into the water to fish or swim, without getting sand and pebbles in our feet. There are mesh air/water pieces but no actual openings, like a sandal would have. And they’re KEEN... okay? Always excellent workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Calery

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like these!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these shoes. Unfortunately for me, they just did not work out and I sent them back. The fit is a little large. The sole is very stiff and unforgiving. They are only just OK for walking and I would not recommend trying to run in them even trail running. The look is great, I just found them not to be very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Gillen

customer_reviews.title: Very cool!
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks, ventilation, and quality construction from Keen. Only downside is lack of arch support which I fix by wearing an insert.
customer_reviews.author: Hu's da boss

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fan of Keens! This pair is a great addition. My husband loves them. I got these in women’s and he saw them and wanted them in men’s. Very light, comfortable, look great!
customer_reviews.author: BlueSage

customer_reviews.title: They hurt
customer_reviews.text: These shoes kind of wobble and slip around on you. I also am having a hard time breaking them in. It hurts my big toe. I don't think I've ever had a keen have such a lengthy break-in.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Mccallum

customer_reviews.title: The shoes looks good, but it was very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes looks good, but it was very uncomfortable. I think we were expecting something comfortable like a cross training shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: too low arch support and not sturdy enough in the sole for what I was intending ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned the item. They did not fit as expected: too low arch support and not sturdy enough in the sole for what I was intending to use them for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fit
customer_reviews.text: I received the shoes yesterday and used them today. I took a 2 mile walk on pavement, stone and firmish beach sand. They are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Guide

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love the super comfy perfect for my wide foot
customer_reviews.author: Tattoomike75

customer_reviews.title: Unique/Cool Looking But...
customer_reviews.text: They are very light but not so comfortable. Very little arch support and very soft insole. My Keen sandals are much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: and they are quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these "sandals" to wear as regular shoes. Nobody can tell the difference, and they are quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tim's Unbiased Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, I will purchase them again.
customer_reviews.text: I prefer these shoes over open sandals. Unlike sandals they do not get rocks, sand, or twigs in them when your walking.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned customer

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for my budget, and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is as expected, and the insole is removable. Great quality at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I wear these everyday for work. They're comfortable and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: MarkG

customer_reviews.title: These shoes smell worse than death
customer_reviews.text: I got the Black/blue version that were the cheapest. I wore these shoes for work maintains pools. After the first three days they smaller so horrible I had to leave them outside. I sprayed them with fabreeze, Lysol, put baking soda in them... nothing helped. I machine washed them on sanitize and that got rid of the stench. I wore them for two days this week and I couldn't stand the smell in the truck as I drove my route. I got back to the office and I threw them out. I drove home barefoot. Don't buy these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: john chiarolanzio

customer_reviews.title: Good slip on's nice fit.
customer_reviews.text: Like most Keens they fit a size smaller. These are really good in between sandals/walking shoes. They breath very well and slide on much like water shoes but have good arch support. I like the bungee laces that keep laces out of the way bit keep them nice and tight.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G

product_meta.title: Keen Men's Uneek Exo Low-Top Sneakers
product_meta.description: An adaptable athletic-inspired shoe featuring comfort and support.,1018766,This shoe is made out of polyester with a rubber sole.,This sandal is outfitted with a Metatomical Footbed Design, provding great arch and foot support. It's also machine washable.,Most customers find this shoe is true to size,,,
